mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_name, m.mem_id, m.mem_tel, m.mem_email, m.mgr_yn, m.mem_delyn, m.mem_post, m.mem_addr1, m.mem_addr2, m.plan_no ,p.mem_no, p.card_name, p.card_exp, p.card_cvc, p.card_pwd, p.card_no, k.plan_no, k.plan_name, k.rcp_qty, k.price from member m, payment_info p, plan k where m.mem_id = #{mem_id} and m.mem_pwd = #{mem_pwd} and m.mem_no = p.mem_no and m.plan_no = k.plan_no
